statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT id, company_name, regulation_name, risk_level FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE company_name = 'Company A' AND compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT id, company_name, regulation_name FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY regulation_name ASC, company_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_companies FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT company_name, risk_level FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE risk_level = 'High' OR risk_level = 'Medium';
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, AVG(LENGTH(company_name)) AS avg_company_name_length FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT id, company_name, regulation_type FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT company_name, regulation_type FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE regulation_type = 'Environmental';
SELECT * FROM risk_monitoring_data ORDER BY monitoring_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY company_name DESC, id
SELECT company_name, regulation_type FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT id, company_name, regulation_type, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE regulation_type = 'Data Protection'
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND regulation_type = 'Privacy' ORDER BY company_name
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM regulatory_compliance_data GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_count > 1
SELECT * FROM compliance_data
SELECT id, name, risk_level FROM compliance_data WHERE risk_level = 3
SELECT name, report_date FROM compliance_data WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT reg_name, reg_description FROM regulations
SELECT compliance_id, record_date, compliance_status FROM monitoring_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant'
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE risk_level >= 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, risk_level, report_date FROM compliance_data WHERE risk_level = 3 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT cd.name, r.reg_name FROM compliance_data cd JOIN monitoring_records mr ON cd.id = mr.compliance_id JOIN regulations r ON r.reg_id = mr.regulation_id;

SELECT cd.name, cd.report_date, mr.record_date, mr.compliance_status FROM compliance_data cd JOIN monitoring_records mr ON cd.id = mr.compliance_id WHERE mr.compliance_status = 'Non-compliant' ORDER BY mr.record_date ASC;

SELECT r.reg_name, r.reg_description, mr.record_date, mr.compliance_status FROM regulations r JOIN monitoring_records mr ON r.reg_id = mr.regulation_id WHERE mr.compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY mr.record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryEntity;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM RegulatoryEntity;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceArea WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_name, area_description FROM ComplianceArea WHERE area_id = 2;
SELECT entity_id, compliance_date, compliance_status FROM ComplianceRecords;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryEntity;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name FROM RegulatoryEntity ORDER BY entity_name DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM RegulatoryEntity WHERE entity_type='Financial';
SELECT * FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, area_name FROM RegulatoryEntity JOIN ComplianceRecords ON RegulatoryEntity.entity_id = ComplianceRecords.entity_id ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, agency_type FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE agency_id = 3;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_id DESC;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM risk_categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, agency_type FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE agency_id = 1;
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM compliance_measures WHERE regulation_id = 2 ORDER BY measure_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
